<title level="1" pfs="">[Servant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3489)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A servant might be a maid or butler, keeping a home in working order, or a server in an establishment like an inn, taking orders and serving customers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Servant.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Servant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3489)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 66

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +5, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +4, [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
cutlery, servant's uniform, serving platter

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 (15 with platter raised)

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 7

</row>

**Quick Catch** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An object the servant could hold in one hand is dropped within the servant's reach; **Requirements** The servant has at least one hand free; **Effect** The servant catches the dropped object before it hits the floor or leaves their reach.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
cutlery +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
cutlery +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Protective Platter**   The servant can raise their serving platter using the [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=2316) action. The platter has the same statistics as a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=17) but requires a hand to hold.

</column>
